name: pnp-read-role-permissions
title: CLI - Check what users assigned to a specific role are allowed to do in a tenant
shortDescription: This script can be used to review what users assigned to a specific role are allowed to do in a Microsoft 365 tenant
longDescription: This script can be used to review what users can do with a specific role by checking the role's' permissions. If the role is inherited, the script includes the role's' permissions from the base role.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
